entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `type` TEXT NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `body_measurement_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `value` TEXT NOT NULL, `timestamp` TEXT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`body_measurement_id`) REFERENCES `body_measurements`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_body_measurement_entries_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_body_measurement_entries_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id`)

indices.name: index_body_measurement_entries_body_measurement_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_body_measurement_entries_body_measurement_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`body_measurement_id`)

indices.name: index_body_measurement_entries_timestamp
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_body_measurement_entries_timestamp` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`timestamp`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`exercise_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `exercise_name` TEXT NOT NULL, `exercise_type` TEXT NOT NULL, `exercise_main_muscles` TEXT NOT NULL, `exercise_secondary_muscles` TEXT NOT NULL, `exercise_tertiary_muscles` TEXT NOT NULL, `exercise_goal` TEXT NOT NULL)

indices.name: index_exercise_exercise_name
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_exercise_exercise_name` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`exercise_name`)

indices.name: index_exercise_exercise_type
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_exercise_exercise_type` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`exercise_type`)

indices.name: index_exercise_exercise_main_muscles
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_exercise_exercise_main_muscles` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`exercise_main_muscles`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`routine_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `routine_name` TEXT NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`routine_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `exercise_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `order_index` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`routine_id`, `exercise_id`), FOREIGN KEY(`routine_id`) REFERENCES `routine`(`routine_id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE , FOREIGN KEY(`exercise_id`) REFERENCES `exercise`(`exercise_id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_exercise_with_routine_exercise_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_exercise_with_routine_exercise_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`exercise_id`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`goal_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `goal_routine_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `goal_exercise_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `goal_min_reps` INTEGER NOT NULL, `goal_max_reps` INTEGER NOT NULL, `sets` INTEGER NOT NULL, `goal_break_duration` INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`goal_routine_id`) REFERENCES `routine`(`routine_id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE DEFERRABLE INITIALLY DEFERRED, FOREIGN KEY(`goal_exercise_id`) REFERENCES `exercise`(`exercise_id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE DEFERRABLE INITIALLY DEFERRED)

indices.name: index_goal_goal_routine_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_goal_goal_routine_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`goal_routine_id`)

indices.name: index_goal_goal_exercise_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_goal_goal_exercise_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`goal_exercise_id`)

views.createSql:
CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT body_measurements.*,
                      latest_body_measurement_entry.id AS bme_id,
                      latest_body_measurement_entry.body_measurement_id as bme_body_measurement_id,
                      latest_body_measurement_entry.value as bme_value,
                      latest_body_measurement_entry.timestamp as bme_timestamp
                 FROM body_measurements
                      LEFT JOIN (SELECT *
                                   FROM body_measurement_entries AS bme1
                                  WHERE bme1.timestamp IN (SELECT MAX(bme2.timestamp)
                                                             FROM body_measurement_entries AS bme2
                                                            GROUP BY bme2.body_measurement_id)
                                  GROUP BY bme1.body_measurement_id
                                  ORDER BY bme1.id DESC) AS latest_body_measurement_entry
                             ON body_measurements.id = latest_body_measurement_entry.body_measurement_id

CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT routine_id, routine_name, GROUP_CONCAT(exercise_name, ', ') as exercise_names from (SELECT routine.*, exercise.exercise_name , ewr.order_index FROM exercise_with_routine ewr LEFT JOIN routine ON routine.routine_id = ewr.routine_id LEFT JOIN exercise ON exercise.exercise_id = ewr.exercise_id ORDER BY ewr.routine_id, ewr.order_index) GROUP BY routine_id
